title: Episode 22: Daniella Mason Pt. 2
description:
On today's episode, Kailey and Daniella pick up their convo right where they left off! Daniella shares how she now lives with an eternal perspective and retells some of  her favorite stories of her late father, Bob Mason, and the miraculous things he experienced while on the mission field ministering in foreign countries.

Thank you to our partners!
